00083         public Object findDMVRecord(String _license) 
00084         {
00085             CPerson cp = null;  // this is the return object
00086             String xml = null;
00087             
00088             // make sure that there is at least one active data service network
00089             if (!RadioInfo.isDataServiceOperational()) {
00090                     lastError = new String("No Data Service Available");
00091                     return null;                    
00092             }
00093                 
00094             // get the request from the server
00095             CitationCatcher_Stub serverObj = new CitationCatcher_Stub();
00096             try {
00097                     xml = serverObj.getDMVResultAsXML(_license);
00098             } 
00099             catch (JAXRPCException e) {
00100                     lastError = e.getMessage();
00101             }
00102             catch (RemoteException e) {
00103                     lastError = e.getMessage();
00104             }
00105             
00106             // fill out a person object from the returned DMV lookup results
00107             if (xml != null)
00108             {
00109                 cp = new CPerson();
00110                 XMLStringParser parser = new XMLStringParser(xml);
00111                 
00112                 cp.setElement(CPerson.LAST, parser.getNamedElement("Lname"));
00113                 cp.setElement(CPerson.MIDDLE, parser.getNamedElement("Mname"));
00114                 cp.setElement(CPerson.FIRST, parser.getNamedElement("Fname"));
00115                 cp.setElement(CPerson.ADDRESS, parser.getNamedElement("Address"));
00116                 cp.setElement(CPerson.CITY, parser.getNamedElement("City"));
00117                 cp.setElement(CPerson.ZIP, parser.getNamedElement("Zip"));
00118                 cp.setElement(CPerson.DOB, parser.getNamedElement("DOB"));
00119                 cp.setElement(CPerson.SEX, parser.getNamedElement("Sex"));
00120                 cp.setElement(CPerson.HEIGHT, parser.getNamedElement("Height"));
00121                 cp.setElement(CPerson.WEIGHT, parser.getNamedElement("Weight"));
00122                 cp.setElement(CPerson.ENDORSEMENTS, parser.getNamedElement("Endorsements"));
00123                 cp.setElement(CPerson.RESTRICTIONS, parser.getNamedElement("Restrictions"));
00124             }
00125             return cp;
00126         }
00127 
00128         
00134         public Object getCourtInfo() 
00135         {
00136                 CViolation cv = null;  // this is the return object that has the necessary court information embedded
00137                 String xml = null;    // unused (non-court info) members are left emtpy
00138                 
00139                 // make sure that there is at least one active data service network
00140                 if (!RadioInfo.isDataServiceOperational()) {
00141                         lastError = new String("No Data Service Available");
00142                         return null;                    
00143                 }
00144 
00145                 // get the request from the server
00146                 CitationCatcher_Stub serverObj = new CitationCatcher_Stub();
00147                 try {
00148                         xml = serverObj.getCourtInfoAsXML();
00149                 }
00150                 catch (JAXRPCException e) {
00151                         lastError = e.getMessage();
00152                 }
00153                 catch (RemoteException e) {
00154                         lastError = e.getMessage();
00155                 }
00156         
00157                 // fill out a violation object from the returned court lookup results
00158                 if (xml != null)
00159                 {
00160                         cv = new CViolation();
00161                         XMLStringParser parser = new XMLStringParser(xml);
00162         
00163                         cv.setElement(CViolation.COURT_DATE, parser.getNamedElement("COURT_DATE"));
00164                         cv.setElement(CViolation.COURT_NAME, parser.getNamedElement("COURT_NAME"));
00165                         cv.setElement(CViolation.COURT_ADDRESS, parser.getNamedElement("COURT_ADDRESS"));
00166                         cv.setElement(CViolation.COURT_CITY, parser.getNamedElement("COURT_CITY"));
00167                         cv.setElement(CViolation.COURT_STATE, parser.getNamedElement("COURT_STATE"));
00168                         cv.setElement(CViolation.COURT_ZIP, parser.getNamedElement("COURT_ZIP"));
00169                         cv.setElement(CViolation.COURT_PHONE, parser.getNamedElement("COURT_PHONE"));
00170                 } 
00171                 return cv;
00172         }
